papers.title: Real-time EEG-based Cognitive Load Assessment for Adaptive User Interfaces
papers.abstract: This paper presents a novel approach for real-time cognitive load assessment using EEG signals to adapt user interfaces dynamically.

papers.title: Heart Rate Variability for Stress-Aware Adaptive Systems
papers.venue: CHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems
papers.abstract: We explore how heart rate variability can be used to create stress-aware adaptive computing systems.

papers.title: Multimodal Physiological Sensing for Personalized Learning Environments
papers.abstract: This study investigates the use of multiple physiological signals to create adaptive learning environments.
